mapper.select: SELECT ILINDEX , ILSPONSOR , ILEDUNAME , ILNAME , ILSUBJECT , ILCONTENTS , ILLOCATION , ILTIME , ILTEL , ILRECOGNITION , ILTYPE , ILPOINT , ILYEAR , ILMONTH , ILDAY , ILURL FROM PTB_EDUSCHEDULE WHERE ILYEAR = #{ilyear} AND ILMONTH = #{ilmonth}

SELECT ILINDEX , ILSPONSOR , ILEDUNAME , ILNAME , ILSUBJECT , ILCONTENTS , ILLOCATION , ILTIME , ILTEL , ILRECOGNITION , ILRECOGNITION_SUB , ILTYPE , ILPOINT , ILYEAR , ILMONTH , ILDAY , ILURL FROM PTB_EDUSCHEDULE WHERE ILINDEX = #{ilindex}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PTB_EDUSCHEDULE( ILSPONSOR, ILEDUNAME, ILNAME, ILSUBJECT, ILCONTENTS, ILLOCATION, ILTIME, ILTEL, ILRECOGNITION, ILTYPE, ILPOINT, ILYEAR, ILMONTH, ILDAY, ILRECOGNITION_SUB, ILURL ) VALUES( #{ilsponsor}, #{ileduname}, #{ilname}, #{ilsubject}, #{ilcontents}, #{illocation}, #{iltime}, #{iltel}, #{ilrecognition}, #{iltype}, #{ilpoint}, #{ilyear}, #{ilmonth}, #{ilday}, #{ilrecognition_sub}, #{ilurl} )
mapper.update: UPDATE PTB_EDUSCHEDULE SET ILSPONSOR = #{ilsponsor}, ILEDUNAME = #{ileduname}, ILNAME = #{ilname}, ILSUBJECT = #{ilsubject}, ILCONTENTS = #{ilcontents}, ILLOCATION = #{illocation}, ILTIME = #{iltime}, ILTEL = #{iltel}, ILRECOGNITION = #{ilrecognition}, ILTYPE = #{iltype}, ILPOINT = #{ilpoint}, ILYEAR = #{ilyear}, ILMONTH = #{ilmonth}, ILDAY = #{ilday}, ILRECOGNITION_SUB = #{ilrecognition_sub}, ILURL = #{ilurl} WHERE ILINDEX = #{ilindex}
